text: (Kappalil cellum) avarkaḷai, malaimukaṭukaḷaip pōṉṟa alai cūḻntu koḷḷumāṉāl, allāhvukkē vaḻipaṭṭu antaraṅka cuttiyuṭaṉ avaṉiṭam pirārttikkiṉṟaṉar; āṉāl avaṉ avarkaḷaik kāppāṟṟikkaraicērttu viṭṭāl, avarkaḷil cilar naṭunilaiyāka naṭantu koḷkiṟārkaḷ - eṉiṉum mikavum naṉṟi keṭṭa, perunturōkikaḷait tavira vēṟu evarum nam attāṭcikaḷai nirākarippatillai
